ü¶æ I deployed TSDProxy to make my Docker Swarm workloads available on my tailnet, and I've since realized that it can proxy more than just other containers.  The Proxy List configuration makes it (relatively) easy to grant access to network resources which don't otherwise support the #Tailscale client (like routers, switches, cameras, NVRs, and other appliances), complete with MagicDNS and automatic SSL. 

This is a really slick project...
